Uses of Interface
io.helidon.webserver.Handler

  • Packages that use Handler 
    Package Description
    io.helidon.security.webserver
    Integration library for RxServer.
    io.helidon.webserver
    Reactive web server API.
    io.helidon.webserver.json
    This package contains JSON-P (javax.json) support for WebServer's Routing.

    • Uses of Handler in io.helidon.webserver

      Classes in io.helidon.webserver that implement Handler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler
      A Handler which executes provided logic only if provided condition is satisfied.
      Methods in io.helidon.webserver that return Handler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> Handler Handler.of​(Class<T> entityType, Handler.EntityHandler<T> entityHandler)
      Creates new instance of the Handler for the entity representing HTTP request content.
      static <T> Handler Handler.of​(Class<T> entityType, Handler.EntityHandler<T> entityHandler, ErrorHandler<Throwable> entityReadErrorHandler)
      Creates new instance of the Handler for the entity representing HTTP request content.
      Handler RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler.otherwise​(Handler handler)
      Creates new Handler instance which executes this handler if condition was satisfied, otherwise executes provided handler.
